mehi anthargathaya sigra lesa wenaskamwalata bhajanaya wiya haki ya. 2013 beljiyanu diyamanthi kollaya brasals guwanthotupola dhawana pathaya dinaya 18 pebarawari 2013 (2013-02-18) welawa 7:40 pawa asthamenthugatha sthanaya brasals sahabhagiwuwo mukawadam damu minisun ata denek prathipalaya dalawashayen eja $ miliyana 50 watana manik sorakama thuwala 0 maranaya(n) 0 2013 pebarawari 18 wana dina, pawa 8 ta mehothakata kalin, beljiyamehi, brasalshi guwan dhawana pathaya mathawu, helwetik guwan samagama wisin kriyathmaka kerunu switsarlanthaya bala piyasariyata niyamithawa thibunu guwan yanaya wetha polis lanchana sahitha motar ratha dekakin pamini mukawadam damu thuwakkukaruwan ata deneku wisin dala washayen $ miliyana 50 watina diyamanthi thogayak sorakam kalaha.[1][2][3] kollaya sidukerune ekada wedi paharak ho nikuth nokaramini.[1]
